short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a goal and track how much time is left until the deadline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Time Up? - Countdown Timer, your ultimate companion for effective goal setting and time management. Whether you're planning a project, preparing for an exam, or striving to build a new habit, Time Up? empowers you to visualize your progress and stay focused until your deadline.

Key Features
Easy Goal Setting

Intuitive Interface: Effortlessly add your goals using a user-friendly form that captures all essential details.
Customizable Deadlines: Select specific dates and times to set precise deadlines for each goal.
Unique Goal Identification: Each goal is assigned a unique ID to ensure accurate tracking and management.
Real-Time Countdown

Dynamic Timer: Watch the countdown timer update in real-time, providing a clear view of how much time remains.
Visual Prominence: A large, easy-to-read display ensures you never lose sight of your deadlines.
Motivational Messages: Receive encouraging prompts to keep you motivated as you approach your goal.
Goal Management

Edit Goals: Modify your goals and deadlines at any time to accommodate changing priorities.
Delete Goals: Remove completed or obsolete goals with a simple click, keeping your dashboard clutter-free.
Organized Dropdown: Select and manage your goals efficiently using the organized dropdown menu.
Data Persistence & Synchronization

Chrome Storage Sync: Your goals and settings are securely stored and synchronized across all devices where you're signed in.
Offline Accessibility: Access and manage your goals even without an internet connection, ensuring uninterrupted productivity.
Sleek & Responsive Design

Modern Aesthetics: A clean, blue and white theme provides a professional and calming user experience.
Responsive Layout: Optimized for various screen sizes, ensuring usability on desktops, laptops, and tablets.
Accessible Navigation: Easy navigation between adding goals and managing existing ones enhances overall usability.
Security & Privacy

Minimal Permissions: Time Up? requires only essential permissions (storage) to function effectively.
Data Privacy: Your data is stored locally and synced securely via Chrome's storage API, ensuring your information remains private.
How It Works
Add a Goal

Click on the "Add Goal" button to open the goal creation form.
Enter a descriptive name for your goal, select a target date, and set a specific time for the deadline.
Submit the form to save your goal and initiate the countdown timer.
Manage Your Goals

Navigate to the "Manage Goals" screen to view all your active goals.
Use the dropdown menu to select a specific goal, view its details, and monitor the remaining time.
Edit or delete goals as needed to keep your productivity streamlined.
Stay Informed

Monitor the countdown timer to stay aware of how much time is left until your deadline.
Receive motivational messages to keep you focused and driven throughout your journey.
Why Choose Time Up?
Boost Productivity: Clearly defined deadlines and real-time tracking help you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively.
Stay Organized: Keep all your goals in one place, making it easy to review and adjust your objectives as needed.
Achieve More: With consistent tracking and motivational prompts, you're more likely to stay committed and reach your targets.
User-Friendly: Designed with simplicity in mind, Time Up? ensures that setting and managing goals is a seamless experience.
Secure & Private: Your data is handled with the utmost care, ensuring privacy and security without compromising functionality.
Additional Features
Data Syncing: Leverage Chrome's Storage Sync API to keep your goals updated across all your devices.
Error Handling: Robust error management ensures the reliability of your goal tracking, handling unexpected scenarios gracefully.
Performance Optimization: Efficient code ensures smooth operation without draining system resources, providing a seamless user experience.
Getting Started
Install the Extension

Visit the Chrome Web Store and click "Add to Chrome" to install Time Up? - Countdown Timer.
Set Up Your First Goal

Open the extension by clicking its icon in the browser toolbar.
Add your first goal by entering the details and setting a deadline.
Begin your journey towards achieving your objectives with confidence and clarity.
Customize Your Experience

Explore the settings to manage existing goals and optimize the extension to suit your workflow.
Screenshots
Include high-quality screenshots showcasing the main interface, goal creation, countdown timer, and goal management features.
